items.title: A Rash of Bomb Threats Hit College and University Libraries
items.description: At least 15 US colleges and universities received bomb threats targeting the library since Sunday as part of a nationwide swatting event.

items.title: Frighteningly Perfect Bookish Halloween Sweatshirts
items.description: Your wardrobe called. It's looking for some sweet bookish Halloween sweatshirts for the season (and beyond!).

items.title: Celebrating Jane Austen at 250, The Death of a YA Horror Legend, & More YA News
items.description: Catch up with the latest from the world of YA with these news and features pieces from elsewhere around the bookish web.

items.title: The Bestselling Books of the Week, According to All the Lists
items.description: USA Today, Publishers Weekly, NYT, Amazon, and Indie Booksellers all have their own bestseller lists. Here are the combined results.

items.title: 31 Book Recommendations for Every Day of LGBTQ History Month
items.description: Here are 31 book recommendations for LGBTQ History Month in October, from history books to historical fiction to picture books.
